languages.text: "Какая ирония. Всю жизнь я избегал{mf||а} законников, а теперь целый проктор просится ко мне в свиту".
"I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."
languages.original_text: "Какая ирония. Всю жизнь я избегал{mf||а} законников, а теперь целый проктор просится ко мне в свиту".

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."
"I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have been avoiding lawmen like the plague, and now a whole Proctor is asking to join my retinue."
"I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."
"I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."
"I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."
"I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

languages.text: "Ich weiß die Ironie der Lage zu schätzen. Mein ganzes Leben lang habe ich Gesetzeshüter gemieden wie die Pest, und jetzt bitte ich einen, sich meinem Gefolge anzuschließen – noch dazu einen Proktor."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß die Ironie der Lage zu schätzen. Mein ganzes Leben lang habe ich Gesetzeshüter gemieden wie die Pest, und jetzt bitte ich einen, sich meinem Gefolge anzuschließen – noch dazu einen Proktor."

languages.text: « L'ironie de la situation ne m'échappe pas. J'ai fui les représentants de l'ordre toute ma vie, et voilà que l'un d'entre eux, un proctor qui plus est, demande à rejoindre mon entourage. »
languages.original_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

traits.locale_text: « L'ironie de la situation ne m'échappe pas. J'ai fui les représentants de l'ordre toute ma vie, et voilà que l'un d'entre eux, un proctor qui plus est, demande à rejoindre mon entourage. »

languages.text: “命运还真会开玩笑。我这辈子都像躲避瘟疫一样躲避执法者，可现在，居然有个执法者主动要求加入我的队伍，居然还是个监察官。”
languages.original_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

traits.locale_text: “命运还真会开玩笑。我这辈子都像躲避瘟疫一样躲避执法者，可现在，居然有个执法者主动要求加入我的队伍，居然还是个监察官。”

languages.text: «Es una situación irónica. Me he pasado toda la vida evitando a los agentes de la ley como la peste, y ahora uno quiere unirse a mi séquito... un Procurador, nada menos».
languages.original_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

traits.locale_text: «Es una situación irónica. Me he pasado toda la vida evitando a los agentes de la ley como la peste, y ahora uno quiere unirse a mi séquito... un Procurador, nada menos».

languages.text: 「この皮肉な状況には感謝すらしたくなるよ。人生ずっと、法執行官なんて疫病神のように避けてきたのに、今になってその法執行官…しかもよりにもよって代理人が{mf|俺|私}の従者に加わりたいと言ってきてるんだから」
languages.original_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

traits.locale_text: 「この皮肉な状況には感謝すらしたくなるよ。人生ずっと、法執行官なんて疫病神のように避けてきたのに、今になってその法執行官…しかもよりにもよって代理人が{mf|俺|私}の従者に加わりたいと言ってきてるんだから」

languages.text: "Ne ironik bir durum. Hayatım boyu kanun adamlarından kaçındım, şimdiyse içlerinden biri maiyetime katılmak istiyor. Üstelik kendisi bir Üsteğmen."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate the irony of the situation. My whole life I have avoided lawmen like the plague, and now one is asking to join my retinue — a Proctor, no less."

traits.locale_text: "Ne ironik bir durum. Hayatım boyu kanun adamlarından kaçındım, şimdiyse içlerinden biri maiyetime katılmak istiyor. Üstelik kendisi bir Üsteğmen."
